Procedure:
Prepare Coffee: 200g coffee for 1 patch brew Let it cool.
(For the cream) Whip eggs, sugar until has thickened. Add mascarpone and whip mixture until blended.
Whip cream till soft peak and fold in to mascarpone mixture.
Combine all liquids and coffee Submerge all ladyfingers within liquid.
In a 4 inch plastic pan place a layer of saturated ladyfingers at the bottom and subsequently cover with a layer of mascarpone cream. Repeat this procedure to create 3 layers. Dust the top of the cake with cocoa powder.
Carmalized onion with oil. add sugar and vinegar cook for 5 min. add tomato and chilli and reduce to a paste.
